title: Room for one more
creator_credit: Barry Milligan and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Victoria Templeton interviews couples who have adopted or fostered disabled children in infancy or early childhood. Discusses the joys and issues surrounding caring for emotionally, physically or intellectually disabled children and emphasises the importance of family relationships.
creator_credit_for_label: Barry Milligan and South Australian Film Corporation
